title: FIFA World Cup 2014 - Day 03 - Uruguay v Costa Rica - Mpeg
description:
World Cup 2014
 
[b]Match only - No Pundits - English Commentary[/b] 

 
[b][size=100][color=blue]Warning: There are people posting the score - Beware if reading comments [/color][/size][/b]
 

Note: Now including Radio Commentary's
MP3 for you player to listen on the way to work
(These won't be added until the next day)
 
No point in leaving a comment
I never read them on these Football torrent
 
It's always a load of complaints
I want mkv, I want mp4
 
It ain't gonna happen from me, move on
 
This is for those who want the matches fast
 
 

=================================================
 
I hope to be posting ALL the matches
 
They will be MpgII for speed
 
I can usually post in under 15 minutes of the final Whistle, if all goes well
(My record is 8 Minutes from whistle to posting)

 
 




 
 

[color=blue][b]I find best played with Windows Media Player[/b][/color]
 
 

Don't want MPEG - Wait a few hours and someone might post the format you want
 
I cap these for ME I just happen to share with you.
 
 
[color=red][b]Speed up your download
Stop all other torrents[/b]
 [/color]
